Texts.Chs: 把^orange;啤酒^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;beer^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 哇！现在你可以制作属于你自己的啤酒了，你离完美的生活又近了一步！
Texts.Eng: Cheers! Now that you can make your own beer, your life is one step closer to perfection.

It's ^blue;beer time^reset;! Go to your ^orange;Fermenter^reset; to make 3 ^green;Beer^reset;. You'll need ^orange;Wort^reset;, ^orange;Hops^reset;, ^orange;Carbon Dioxide^reset;, and ^orange;Yeast Water^reset;, plus an ^orange;Empty Bottle^reset;.
